Your career is exactly that: yours. So as you progress, you can guide us on the direction you’re hoping to take, and we’ll do our best to get you there. You’ll also be working in one of the fastest-growing insurance companies in Asia.

Things move fast round here. These are just some of the ways in which you’ll spend your time.

Participating in the development of ideas and strategies for new digital initiatives
Identifying market opportunities through research and SWOT analysis
Managing some of our greenfield digital projects
Collaborating with stakeholders on how to improve our tech and maximize our efficiency
Jumping in on ad hoc duties and responsibilities when they arise

We need high-calibre, skilled professionals to become our future leaders. So, we’re looking for freethinkers with a start-up mindset and a creative approach to tech.  Because smart tech leads to a better customer experience. And in the end, that’s why we do what we do.

You have exposure and skills working with innovative technology and within a digital environment.
You have some of your best ideas in uncertain or ambiguous situations.
You thrive in a feedback environment (it’s how we all grow and learn).
You have a passion for digital that extends beyond the classroom.
You are an early adopter, with a constant eye on new trends as they are happening.
You are a natural collaborator. Support your team, not afraid to ask for help, or a second pair of eyes.

Fluency in written and spoken English & Chinese
